issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

fields.summary: ELB listener creation fails when more than 2 HTTPS listeners are attached

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After updating a stack to create multiple HTTPS listeners to an ELB (HTTPS/SSL termination), all HTTPS listeners worked except  one.
* ELB with multiple HTTPS listeners:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region devops-admin@drake
LOAD_BALANCER	DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0	DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	take-care	subnet-818ac952	vpc-242e381b	i-98edcf38,i-5309a684	{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=27443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus,{DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=44443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus,{DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=8443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=5443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}}				{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08,DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy}	{owner-alias=001095389763,group-name=DevOpsNginxStack-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-DNTEIF2UC7QPN}	{sg-2f89c353}	2017-01-31T21:10:38.463Z	internet-facing
{code}
* Attempt to connect to HTTPS endpoints via curl (443 connection fails):
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8443
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:47:24 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 416239
Last-Modified: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:15:12 GMT
ETag: "5890fe60-659ef"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
curl: (7) Failed connect to DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:443; Connection refused
[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:44443
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:54:43 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 416239
Last-Modified: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:15:12 GMT
ETag: "5890fe60-659ef"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}

*Steps*

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25734.119.20170117git96ba726.el7}}

*Steps*

# Created federated setup with two Eucalyptus clouds
#* [hspencer-240-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/240/]
#* [hspencer-243-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/243/]
#* {code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions
REGION	drake	http://ec2.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://ec2.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Created non-eucalyptus account in native region {{drake}}:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
{code}
# Bundled, uploaded and registered Ubuntu Xenial HVM image to {{future}} region.
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-images emi-6b3768f5 --region devops-admin@future
IMAGE	emi-6b3768f5	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170120/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	001095389763	available	public	x86_64	machine		instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template, created stack on {{future}} region:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack DevOpsNginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-f7586421 --region devops-admin@drake
arn:aws:cloudformation::001095389763:stack/DevOpsNginxStack/ebe60d66-0da0-4e3a-92ba-535433b92775

[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	DevOpsNginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-01-31T21:09:40.211Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-f7586421
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	devopsnginxstack-s3loggingbucket-h5rwbmvnjewwu
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Create server certificate for HTTPS listeners:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# openssl genrsa 4096 > devops-admin-server.pem
[root@d-02 ~]# openssl req -new -x509 -key devops-admin-server.pem -out devops-admin-cacert.pem -days 365
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-servercertupload --server-certificate-name devops-admin-eucalyptus --certificate-file devops-admin-cacert.pem --private-key-file devops-admin-server.pem --region devops-admin@drake
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region devops-admin@drake
arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus
{code}
# Use linked {{cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json}} template to update the deployed stack:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-update-stack DevOpsNginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-f7586421 --parameter ServerCertArn=arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus --region devops-admin@drake
arn:aws:cloudformation::001095389763:stack/DevOpsNginxStack/ebe60d66-0da0-4e3a-92ba-535433b92775

[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	DevOpsNginxStack	UPDATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to add multiple HTTPS listeners to an ELB+ASG stack deployed on Eucalyptus VPC	2017-01-31T21:09:40.211Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-f7586421
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	ServerCertArn		arn:aws:iam::001095389763:server-certificate/devops-admin-eucalyptus
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	devopsnginxstack-s3loggingbucket-h5rwbmvnjewwu
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Use curl to test HTTPS endpoints:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8443
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:47:24 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 416239
Last-Modified: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:15:12 GMT
ETag: "5890fe60-659ef"
Accept-Ranges: bytes

[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
curl: (7) Failed connect to DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:443; Connection refused
[root@d-02 ~]# curl -I -k https://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-02101QO6SWHL0-001095389763.lb.d-14.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:44443
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: nginx/1.10.0 (Ubuntu)
Date: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:54:43 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 416239
Last-Modified: Tue, 31 Jan 2017 21:15:12 GMT
ETag: "5890fe60-659ef"
Accept-Ranges: bytes
{code}
fields.summary: HTTPS listener omitted when multiple HTTPS listeners are added to ELB

comments.body: Fix is pushed and I have verified that the new service image has the fix in it.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.4.0-0.25812.163.20170303gitb711a30.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus 4.4 VPC, multi-cluster cloud - [hspencer-529-maint-4.4|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint_4.4/529/]
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-availability-zones
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-dollar	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	black-market	available
AVAILABILITYZONE	port-of-miami	available
{code}
# Created non-eucalyptus account (for example {{engineering}}) via {{euare-accountcreate}}
# Bundled, uploaded and registered Ubuntu Xenial HVM EMI:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euca-describe-images --region eng-admin@
IMAGE	emi-e34fb3d1	ubuntu-xenial-x86_64-hvm-20170307/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml	000225068559	available	private	x86_64	machine		instance-store	hvm
{code}
# Using linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template, deploy stack:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-create-stack DevOpsNginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json -p KeyName=eng-admin -p ImageId=emi-e34fb3d1 -p EndPoint=http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/DevOpsNginxStack/25652099-b256-4c3c-8500-5989a8fb58fe
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	DevOpsNginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-03-07T19:52:56.345Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-e34fb3d1
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	devopsnginxstack-s3loggingbucket-rfdrskkwat279
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-ODYZAZBUG4JDL-000225068559.lb.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Generate OpenSSL certificates for IAM server certificate creation:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# openssl genrsa 4096 > eng-admin-server.pem
[root@a-34-l ~]# openssl req -new -x509 -key eng-admin-server.pem -out eng-admin-cacert.pem -days 365
[root@a-34-l ~]# euare-servercertupload --server-certificate-name eng-admin-nginx-cluster --certificate-file eng-admin-cacert.pem --private-key-file eng-admin-server.pem --region eng-admin@
[root@a-34-l ~]# euare-servercertlistbypath --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster
{code}
# Update stack using linked {{cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json}} template:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-update-stack DevOpsNginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-add-https-custompolicies-listeners-vpc-template.json -p KeyName=eng-admin -p ImageId=emi-e34fb3d1 -p EndPoint=http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ -p ServerCertArn=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eng-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000225068559:stack/DevOpsNginxStack/25652099-b256-4c3c-8500-5989a8fb58fe
[root@a-34-l ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@
STACK	DevOpsNginxStack	UPDATE_COMPLETE_CLEANUP_IN_PROGRESS		CloudFormation template to add multiple HTTPS listeners to an ELB+ASG stack deployed on Eucalyptus VPC	2017-03-07T19:52:56.345Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-e34fb3d1
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	ServerCertArn		arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	devopsnginxstack-s3loggingbucket-rfdrskkwat279
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-ODYZAZBUG4JDL-000225068559.lb.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
{code}
# Test ELB endpoints using curl:
{code}
[root@a-34-l ~]# eulb-describe-lbs --show-long --region eng-admin@
LOAD_BALANCER	DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-ODYZAZBUG4JDL	DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-ODYZAZBUG4JDL-000225068559.lb.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	black-dollar	subnet-0b676d14	vpc-64856db5	i-6b484529,i-2643322e	{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=8443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=5443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster,{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=27443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster,{DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}},{protocol=HTTPS,lb-port=44443,instance-protocol=HTTP,instance-port=80,cert-id=arn:aws:iam::000225068559:server-certificate/eng-admin-nginx-cluster,{DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08}}				{ELBSecurityPolicy-2016-08,DevOpsTestSSLNegotiationPolicy,DevOpsProdSSLNegotiationPolicy}	{owner-alias=000225068559,group-name=DevOpsNginxStack-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-W1C3SLUGRYTBU}	{sg-ba5ad2fb}	2017-03-07T19:53:58.566Z	internet-facing
[root@a-34-l ~]# curl -I http://DevOpsNgi-NginxELB-ODYZAZBUG4JDL-000225068559.lb.d-25.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
